verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after they had come out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Moreover let the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> keep <S%H6213><s%> the Passover <S%H6453><s%> in its appointed season. <S%H4150><s%>

On the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of this month, <S%H2320><s%> at evening, <S%H6153><s%> you shall keep <S%H6213><s%> it in its appointed season <S%H4150><s%>â€”according to all its statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and according to all its ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> you shall keep it. <S%H6213><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they should keep <S%H6213><s%> the Passover. <S%H6453><s%>

They kept <S%H6213><s%> the Passover <S%H6453><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H6153><s%> at evening, in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai. <S%H5514><s%> According to all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did. <S%H6213><s%>

There were certain men, <S%H582><s%> who were unclean <S%H2931><s%> because of the dead body <S%H5315><s%> of a man, <S%H120><s%> so that they could <S%H3201><s%> not keep <S%H6213><s%> the Passover <S%H6453><s%> on that day, <S%H3117><s%> and they came <S%H7126><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> on that day. <S%H3117><s%>

Those <S%H1992><s%> men <S%H582><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H2931><s%> "We are unclean because of the dead body <S%H5315><s%> of a man. <S%H120><s%> Why are we kept back, <S%H1639><s%> that we may not offer <S%H7126><s%> the offering <S%H7133><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in its appointed season <S%H4150><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H5975><s%> "Wait, that I may hear <S%H8085><s%> what Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will command concerning you. <S%H6680><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Say <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> <S%H376><s%> 'If any man <S%H376><s%> of you or of your generations <S%H1755><s%> is unclean <S%H2931><s%> by reason of a dead body, <S%H5315><s%> or is on a journey <S%H1870><s%> far away, <S%H7350><s%> he shall still keep <S%H6213><s%> the Passover <S%H6453><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

In the second <S%H8145><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> at evening <S%H6153><s%> they shall keep <S%H6213><s%> it; <S%H398><s%> they shall eat it with unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> and bitter herbs. <S%H4844><s%>

They shall leave <S%H7604><s%> none of it until the morning, <S%H1242><s%> nor break <S%H7665><s%> a bone <S%H6106><s%> of it. <S%H2708><s%> According to all the statute of the Passover <S%H6453><s%> they shall keep it. <S%H6213><s%>

But the man <S%H376><s%> who is clean, <S%H2889><s%> and is not on a journey, <S%H1870><s%> and fails <S%H2308><s%> to keep <S%H6213><s%> the Passover, <S%H6453><s%> that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people. <S%H5971><s%> Because he didn't <S%H7126><s%> offer the offering <S%H7133><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in its appointed season, <S%H4150><s%> that man <S%H376><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his sin. <S%H2399><s%>

<S%H1616><s%>"'If a foreigner lives <S%H1481><s%> among you, <S%H6213><s%> and desires to keep the Passover <S%H6453><s%> to Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> according to the statute <S%H2708><s%> of the Passover, <S%H6453><s%> and according to its ordinance, <S%H2708><s%> so shall he do. <S%H6213><s%> You shall have one <S%H259><s%> statute, <S%H2708><s%> both for the foreigner, <S%H1616><s%> and for him who is born <S%H249><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>'"

On the day <S%H3117><s%> that the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was raised up, <S%H6965><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> even the Tent <S%H4908><s%> of the Testimony: <S%H5715><s%> and at evening <S%H6153><s%> it was over the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> as it were the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of fire, <S%H784><s%> until morning. <S%H1242><s%>
So it was continually. <S%H8548><s%> The cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> it, <S%H4758><s%> and the appearance of fire <S%H784><s%> by night. <S%H3915><s%>

Whenever <S%H6310><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up <S%H5927><s%> from over the Tent, <S%H168><s%> then after <S%H310><s%> that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> traveled; <S%H5265><s%> and in the place <S%H4725><s%> where the cloud <S%H6051><s%> remained, <S%H7931><s%> there the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> encamped. <S%H2583><s%>

At the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> traveled, <S%H5265><s%> and at the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> they encamped. <S%H2583><s%> As long as <S%H3117><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> remained <S%H7931><s%> on the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> they remained encamped. <S%H2583><s%>

When the cloud <S%H6051><s%> stayed <S%H748><s%> on the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> then the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> kept <S%H8104><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s command, <S%H4931><s%> and didn't <S%H5265><s%> travel.

Sometimes <S%H3426><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was a few <S%H4557><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> on the tabernacle; <S%H4908><s%> then according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> they remained encamped, <S%H2583><s%> and according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> they traveled. <S%H5265><s%>

Sometimes <S%H3426><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was from evening <S%H6153><s%> until morning; <S%H1242><s%> and when the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up <S%H5927><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> they traveled: <S%H5265><s%> or by day <S%H3119><s%> and by night, <S%H3915><s%> when the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up, <S%H5927><s%> they traveled. <S%H5265><s%>

Whether it was two days, <S%H3117><s%> or a month, <S%H2320><s%> or a year <S%H3117><s%> that the cloud <S%H6051><s%> stayed <S%H748><s%> on the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> remaining <S%H7931><s%> on it, <S%H1121><s%> the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> remained encamped, <S%H2583><s%> and didn't <S%H5265><s%> travel; but when it was taken up, <S%H5927><s%> they traveled. <S%H5265><s%>

At the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> they encamped, <S%H2583><s%> and at the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> they traveled. <S%H5265><s%> They kept <S%H8104><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s command, <S%H4931><s%> at the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
